pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Buffs summons and pets while the totem is active. Higher levels provide more type of buffs.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/totem_of_amethyst)Totem of Amethyst$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 3$(br)$(l)Active/Passive:$() Activated, drains durability while active and summons are nearby$(br)$(l)Tier:$() Medium(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Other active totem augments.
